title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 152 - Physicians And Surgeons Professional Insurance Merit Rating Plan
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 152

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 2343[d], [e]; L. 2002, ch. 1, part A, § 42, as amd. by L. 2002, ch. 82, part J, § 16; L. 2005, ch. 420

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
